method.name: 1R Discretizer

reference.ref: R.C. Holte. Very simple classification rules perform well on most commonly used datasets. Machine Learning 11 (1993) 63-91.

generalDescription.objective: To transform a set of numerical variables into nominal variables. Input variables may be either real or integer.
generalDescription.howWork:
1R Discretizer is an algorithm that discretizes the non nominal attributes (real or integer) of a group of instances.
The task of a discretization algorithm is to build a set of intervals for each non nominal attribute. The value of the attribute is translated to the interval number to which the value belongs.
1R Discretizer builds the intervals adding the adjacent values while the number of the maximum class is below a threshold, or if the adjacent value has the same associated class than the maximum class.

parameterSpec.param: minimumValuesOfSameClassPerInterval: is the number of the minimum number of real values associated to the maximum class present in the interval in order to build it.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: 1R Discretizer Dataset: Iris Plants
Input Training set: Iris-10-1tra.dat Input Test set: Iris-10-1tst.dat Output Training set: Disc-OneR.iris-10-1tra.dat Output Test set: Disc-OneR.iris-10-1tst.dat Descriptor: result1e0.txt
Parameters: default values
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the datasets/Disc-OneR.iris folder the discretization results; 3 files are generated in this folder:
Disc-OneR.iris-10-1tra.dat: @relation iris @attribute sepalLength {0,1,2,3} @attribute sepalWidth {0,1} @attribute petalLength {0,1,2} @attribute petalWidth {0,1} @attribute @relation iris @attribute sepalLength {0,1,2,3} @attribute sepalWidth {0,1} @attribute petalLength {0,1,2} @attribute petalWidth {0,1} @attribute class{Iris-setosa,Iris-versicolor,Iris-virginica} @inputs sepalLength,sepalWidth,petalLength,petalWidth @outputs class @data 0,0,0,0,Iris-setosa 1,0,0,0,Iris-setosa 2,1,0,0,Iris-setosa 0,0,0,0,Iris-setosa 1,1,0,0,Iris-setosa 2,0,1,0,Iris-versicolor 2,0,1,0,Iris-versicolor 2,0,1,0,Iris-versicolor 2,0,1,0,Iris-versicolor 2,0,1,0,Iris-versicolor 2,0,2,1,Iris-virginica 3,0,2,1,Iris-virginica 2,0,2,0,Iris-virginica 2,0,2,1,Iris-virginica 2,0,1,1,Iris-virginica
result1s0.txt: It contains the descriptor of cutting points used in the discretization.
